errorMessage: The description of an Embedded Textual Body may include accessibility key which has one or more values with each accessibility instance described using schema.org/Audience classes and properties
title: Implements **Embedded Textual Body _accessibility_ key** which has one or more values with each accessibility instance described using **[schema.org/Audience](http://schema.org/accessibilityFeature) classes and properties** - [model 3.3.4](#https://www.w3.org/TR/annotation-model/#accessibility-of-content)
description: True when Annotation includes one or more Embedded Textual Bodies, one or more of which include accessibility key which has one or more values with each accessibility instance described using schema.org/Audience classes and properties. (Section 3.3.4)
